鍝鍝鍝

鍝字的基本解释

鍝
yú
〔鐻（
锯。q?）鍝〕金属耳环，如“椎结左衽鍝鍝之君。”

鍝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yú］
［《廣韻》遇俱切，平虞，疑。］
锯。

鍝字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鍝； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1314第11
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?元俱切，音虞。【玉篇】鋸也。　又【集韻】鐻鍝，穿耳物。【杜篤·論都賦】椎結左袵鐻鍝之君。【埤蒼】穿耳以垂金寶也。

鍝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鍝字的起名意思

暂无。

鍝
Basic explanation of words
鍝
yú
〔鐻(
saw. q?) 鍝] metal earrings, such as "the lord of the left vertebral knot 鍝鍝."
鍝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yú］
["Guangyun" meets all cuts, pingyu, and suspicion. ]
saw.
鍝
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Su Ji 1】【Golden Word Department】　鍝; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1314-11
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Yuan Ju cut, sound Yu. [Jade articles] Saw also.　[Jiyun] 鐻鍝, piercing ears. 【Du Du·Lundu Fu】The king of the left spine of the vertebral knot. [Picang] Piercing the ears to droop the gold treasure.
鍝
